thread.section_title: www.marlows-diamonds.co.uk Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.marlows-diamonds.co.uk
thread.title: Gareth Ellis

author: Gareth Ellis
title: Gareth Ellis
text: From the moment I came in to buy my engagement ring (2 years ago) I was blown away by the helpful and friendly staff. Our recent visit to buy our wedding rings was no different. Despite both visits being a Saturday the staff were helpful, and most of all patient with me on my own and then with my fiancee. I will definitely be recommending Marlows to anyone I know who is getting engaged or married. Thanks again to all
